name: Let it grow (SunFiraGames, IsaVII)
description:
In this game you bring the spring to the meadows. Let grow over a thousand beautiful flowers! When the daffodil blooms, spring is back and you win the game.

By typing the correct letters of the raindrops you can water the world, so the flowers can grow. Beware of the hail - if you type the letter of a hail - you get penalty time and Spring needs longer to come. Cherry blossoms and bees let the flowers grow faster.

Who will be the one who can bring Spring back the fastest? A global high score shows it!

... or just play the game and relax with relaxing music and watch the flowers grow.

* ~ * ~ * ~ * ~ *

The game was created by SunFira and IsaVII during the Spring-Jam 30.04.2021- 02.05.2021.

Art: IsaVII
Programming: SunFira & IsaVII
